sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SYRINGE, a well-known inſtrument, ſerving to imbibe or suck in a quantity of fluid, and to ſquirt or expel the ſame with violence. The word is formed from the Greek συϑεγ, or the Latin ſyrinx “a pipe.”—A ſyringe is only a single pump, and the water aſcends in it on the ſame principle as in the common ſucking-pump. See Hydrostatics, n⁰ 25, et ſeq.
